French: École de la puissance de feu

English: The practice of crop rotation is now being used in local farms.
Phosphates are now being used to fertilize farm soil in the area.
Nitrates are now being used to fertilize farm soil in the area.
Deep shaft mining has been developed in the province.
Pit mining has been developed in the province.
Strip mining has been developed in the province.
Recent reforms to tax laws have increased our tax efficiency… at least until those laws are repealed or loopholes found to evade them.
Plantations have been started in this province to more efficiently and intensively farm it-- even though this comes with a risk of exhausting the farmland.
The intensive farming of this province's farmland has exhausted the soil. Production will be low until the land recovers.
An irrigation network has been built here, allowing the desert to be farmed more effectively.
Our nation has recently experienced a change in our population growth. It will likely remain stable for some time to come.
Our nation's growth rate is abysmal-- roughly equivalent to one child for every four healthy adults.
Our nation's growth rate is very low-- roughly equivalent to one child for every two healthy adults.
Our nation's growth rate is low-- roughly equivalent to three children for every four healthy adults.
Our nation's growth rate is stable-- roughly equivalent to two children for every two healthy adults.
Our nation's growth rate is above average-- roughly equivalent to five children for every four healthy adults.
Our nation's growth rate is high-- roughly equivalent to three children for every two healthy adults.
Our nation's growth rate is very high-- roughly equivalent to four children for every two healthy adults.
Caught between the forces of abolitionism and those supporting slavery, this state is in the throes of violence as the locals attempt to sway the entire populace one way or the other.
